import React from 'react' import "../Cart/Cart.css" import cart from "../../../Images/cart.png" function Cart(props) { const {cartItems,onAdd,onRemove}=props return (

CART EMPTY

Good food is always cooking, go ahead and order some items from the menu.

{ cartItems.map((item)=>{ return(
{item.Name}
Rs. {item.Price.to * item.qty}
) }) }
{/*

SUBTOTAL :

*/}
) } export default Cart
